desc: Timeless goods with a social conscience to inspire the enjoyment of being outdoors. Shop our range of Waxed Canvas products, tools and accessories.

layout.text: The Lunch Bag for all adventures
The Waxed Canvas Lunch Bag is our take on the classic paper lunch bag. Made with 16oz waxed cotton canvas and a roll-top design, it's a handy wee thing to just pack and go.
